changeSet.author: Pritesh.Bhate
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE TELEPORT_SCHEMA.tracking_numbers ( id NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, tracking_number VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, origin_country_id VARCHAR2(10), destination_country_id VARCHAR2(10), customer_id VARCHAR2(36), customer_name VARCHAR2(100), customer_slug VARCHAR2(100), weight NUMBER(10,2), created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE );
